name: bologna
reason: Mystery meat with corn syrup and sodium phosphate.

name: spam
reason: Pork shoulder, salt, sugar, and sodium nitrite. Wartime survival food.

name: vienna sausage
reason: Mechanically separated meat in a can. Enough said.

name: canola oil
reason: Industrially processed seed oil extracted with chemical solvents. Didn't exist before the 1970s.

name: corn oil
reason: Requires heavy industrial processing to extract oil from corn kernels. Your ancestors never ate this.

name: cottonseed oil
reason: Oil from a plant grown for textiles, not nutrition. Originally classified as industrial waste.

name: grapeseed oil
reason: A byproduct of winemaking, marketed as healthy but extracted with chemical solvents.

name: rice bran oil
reason: Heavily processed oil extracted from the bran layer of rice. Not a traditional fat source.

name: safflower oil
reason: Another industrial seed oil. Safflower was traditionally used as a dye, not a food.

name: soybean oil
reason: The most consumed oil in America — and also the most heavily processed. Extracted with hexane.

name: sunflower oil
reason: Industrially extracted seed oil high in omega-6 linoleic acid.

name: soy lecithin
reason: Industrial byproduct of soybean oil processing. Found in almost every processed food.

name: coffee creamer
reason: Contains no cream. It's water, sugar, and partially hydrogenated soybean oil.

name: crisco
reason: Hydrogenated soybean oil. The original seed oil trash.

name: french fries
reason: Potatoes are food. Potatoes deep-fried in seed oil with added 'natural beef flavor'? That's trash.

name: i cant believe its not butter
aliases: i can't believe it's not butter
reason: Soybean oil pretending to be butter. We can believe it's not butter.

name: margarine
aliases: i cant believe its not butter
reason: Solidified seed oils. Originally invented as a cheap substitute for butter using industrial chemistry.

name: mayonnaise
reason: Modern mayo is almost entirely soybean oil. Traditional mayo was made with olive oil or egg yolks and lemon.

name: miracle whip
reason: Soybean oil, corn syrup, and modified food starch. Can't legally be called mayonnaise.

name: ranch dressing
reason: Primarily soybean oil with buttermilk powder, MSG, and artificial flavors. America's favorite seed oil delivery system.

name: shortening
reason: Hydrogenated seed oils. Crisco was originally made from cottonseed oil for candle-making.

name: trans fat
reason: Artificially created by pumping hydrogen gas into seed oils. So dangerous even the FDA banned them.

name: agave nectar
reason: Marketed as 'natural' but processed like high fructose corn syrup — up to 90% fructose.

name: artificial sweetener
reason: Synthetic chemicals that trick your brain into thinking you're eating sugar. Your body isn't fooled.

name: bagel
reason: Dense refined wheat — one bagel has the same carbs as 4 slices of bread. And that's before the cream cheese.

name: bagel bites
reason: Mini bagels with soybean oil and processed cheese.

name: bbq sauce
reason: Check the first ingredient — it's almost always high fructose corn syrup, not tomatoes.

name: beyond meat
reason: Pea protein isolate, canola oil, methylcellulose, and 20+ ingredients. Plants don't naturally form burgers.

name: breadsticks
reason: Refined flour sticks brushed with seed oil and garlic powder. Real garlic bread uses butter.

name: breakfast cereal
reason: Grains stripped of nutrients, extruded at high heat, then 'fortified' with synthetic vitamins.

name: breakfast sandwich
reason: Real eggs on a refined English muffin with processed cheese and factory pork — the whole being worse than its parts.

name: brownie
reason: Sugar, refined flour, and cheap chocolate — the boxed mix kind has ingredients you can't pronounce.

name: burger king
reason: Flame-grilled sounds healthy until you read the ingredient list — the buns alone contain over 20 ingredients.

name: cake
reason: Refined flour, sugar, seed oils, artificial colors and flavors — assembled into something your grandmother wouldn't recognize.

name: candy
reason: Pure sugar, artificial colors, and flavors. Your great-grandmother wouldn't recognize this as food.

name: capri sun
reason: Sugar water in a pouch for kids. Brilliant marketing, terrible nutrition.

name: cereal bar
reason: Marketed as healthy — check the label: it's a cookie with added fiber and a health claim.

name: cheerios
reason: Whole grain oats plus sugar, tripotassium phosphate, and added vitamins to seem healthy.

name: cheese whiz
reason: Canola oil, milk protein, and sodium phosphate — not cheese.

name: cheez whiz
reason: Contains very little actual cheese. Mostly seed oils, modified food starch, and artificial colors.

name: cheez-it
reason: Soybean oil, refined flour, and "cheese" product.

name: chicken nuggets
reason: Mechanically separated chicken, bread crumbs, seed oils, and over 30 other ingredients. Not chicken.

name: chicken sandwich
reason: Processed bun, breaded chicken fried in seed oil, mayo made from soybean oil. A whole-food ingredient buried under processing.

name: chicken tenders
reason: Mechanically separated chicken, breaded with refined flour, fried in seed oil. Not the same as actual chicken.

name: chocolate bar
reason: Sugar, milk powder, and cocoa butter — modern chocolate bars are mostly sugar with a hint of cacao.

name: coca cola
reason: Liquid sugar (or artificial sweeteners). 39 grams of high-fructose corn syrup per can.

name: coco pops
reason: Chocolate-flavored sugar bombs for breakfast.

name: coffee drink
reason: Coffee buried under sugar, cream substitutes, and seed oil derivatives — a dessert pretending to be a drink.

name: cookies
reason: Refined flour + sugar + seed oils = the unholy trinity of ultra-processed baking.

name: cool ranch doritos
reason: Contains maltodextrin, seed oils, artificial flavors, and MSG.

name: cool whip
reason: Contains no cream. It's hydrogenated seed oils, corn syrup, and chemicals shaped like whipped cream.

name: corn dog
reason: A hot dog battered in cornmeal and deep-fried in seed oil.

name: corn syrup
reason: Invented in 1957. Obesity epidemic started in the 1970s when it replaced sugar in everything. Coincidence?

name: croissant
reason: A real French croissant uses only butter. Commercial ones replace it with margarine and seed oils to cut costs.

name: diet soda
reason: No calories, but artificial sweeteners trick your brain and may disrupt gut bacteria.

name: donuts
reason: Refined flour deep-fried in seed oil and coated in sugar. A triple threat of processed ingredients.

name: doritos
reason: Corn, seed oils, and dozens of engineered flavor chemicals designed to override your satiety signals.

name: energy drink
reason: Caffeine, taurine, artificial sweeteners, and synthetic B-vitamins. Just drink coffee.

name: fanta
reason: Orange-flavored sugar water with zero actual orange.

name: fish and chips
reason: The batter is refined flour, deep-fried in industrial seed oil. The chips too. All the omega-3 benefits of the fish are cancelled out.

name: fish sticks
reason: Mystery fish coated in refined breadcrumbs and pre-fried in seed oil. The fish is the least of the ingredients.

name: flavored yogurt
reason: More sugar per cup than a candy bar — the fruit is usually just jam and the yogurt is low-fat.

name: fried chicken
reason: Coated in refined flour and deep-fried in seed oil at industrial scale. The chicken itself is fine — it's everything around it.

name: frosted flakes
reason: Sugar-coated corn flakes. Tony the Tiger lied to you.

name: frozen pizza
reason: Refined flour crust made with seed oils, topped with processed cheese and preservatives.

name: fruit juice
reason: Fiber removed, pasteurized dead, often from concentrate with added sugar. Eat the whole fruit instead.

name: fruit loops
reason: Zero actual fruit. 100% refined grains and sugar.

name: gatorade
reason: Sugar water with artificial dyes marketed as athletic fuel. You're not a professional athlete.

name: goldfish crackers
reason: Enriched wheat flour and seed oils shaped like fish.

name: granola bar
reason: Sugar, seed oils, and 'natural flavors' held together with corn syrup. A candy bar in a hiking wrapper.

name: hamburger
reason: The bun is refined flour, the patty is factory-farmed, the sauce is seed oil. The whole package is engineered to override your satiety signals.

name: hawaiian punch
reason: High fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, and Red 40.

name: high fructose corn syrup
reason: Industrially produced sweetener that didn't exist before the 1960s. Found in 75% of packaged foods.

name: hot dog
reason: Mechanically separated meat, corn syrup, sodium nitrite, and artificial flavors in a tube shape.

name: hot pockets
reason: Over 40 ingredients including multiple seed oils and preservatives. Not food your body recognizes.

name: ice cream
reason: Commercial ice cream: sugar, cream, corn syrup, guar gum, carrageenan, 'natural flavors'. Real ice cream needs 3 ingredients.

name: impossible burger
reason: Soy protein, seed oils, and methylcellulose engineered to bleed like meat. 21 ingredients to imitate one.

name: instant ramen
reason: Noodles deep-fried in palm or seed oil, with a flavor packet full of MSG and artificial flavors.

name: ketchup
reason: More sugar per tablespoon than ice cream. Tomato-flavored candy sauce.

name: kit kat
reason: Wafer, sugar, palm oil, and soy lecithin. Not food.

name: kool aid
reason: Sugar, citric acid, and artificial colors. Not even close to food.

name: kraft singles
reason: Legally cannot be called 'cheese' — it's a 'pasteurized prepared cheese product' made with seed oils.

name: lays chips
reason: Potatoes deep-fried in seed oils. The potato deserved better.

name: lucky charms
reason: Refined grains, sugar, seed oils, and artificial dyes shaped into fun shapes. Candy in a cereal box.

name: lunchable
reason: Processed meat, processed cheese, and crackers with seed oils.

name: m&ms
reason: Milk chocolate surrounded by sugar shells and artificial colors.

name: mac and cheese
reason: Refined pasta + processed cheese powder + seed oils. The orange color comes from annatto and chemicals, not real cheese.

name: mars bar
reason: Sugar, glucose syrup, and palm fat. Your ancestors wouldn't recognize this.

name: mcdonalds
reason: A masterclass in food engineering — every item is designed in a lab to be hyper-palatable and override your body's stop signals.

name: meal replacement
reason: Science fiction food — synthetic nutrients suspended in seed oil and maltodextrin. Humans aren't machines.

name: microwave meal
reason: Designed to survive months in a freezer — that shelf stability comes from industrial processing.

name: monster energy
reason: A chemistry experiment disguised as a beverage.

name: mountain dew
reason: 46 grams of high-fructose corn syrup, brominated vegetable oil, and Yellow 5. Not food.

name: msg
reason: Industrially produced glutamate used to make ultra-processed food taste more appealing than it is.

name: muffin
reason: A cupcake pretending to be breakfast — most muffins have more sugar than a candy bar.

name: nesquik
reason: Sugar, cocoa processed with alkali, soybean lecithin.

name: nutella
reason: First ingredient: sugar. Second: palm oil. It's 58% sugar and only 13% hazelnut.

name: oreos
reason: Sugar, unbleached enriched flour, and palm/canola oil. The 'creme' contains no cream.

name: pancakes
reason: Refined flour, sugar, and seed oil — then drowned in corn syrup marketed as 'maple'. Real pancakes need none of this.

name: pepsi
reason: High fructose corn syrup in a can.

name: pizza
reason: Commercial pizza dough is refined flour, the cheese is processed, and the sauce often contains added sugar and seed oils.

name: pizza rolls
reason: Enriched flour, soybean oil, imitation cheese, and processed meat.

name: plant milk
reason: Mostly water, seed oils, gums, and emulsifiers with a small amount of the named plant. Not milk.

name: pop tarts
reason: Refined flour, seed oils, and high-fructose corn syrup baked into a candy bar disguised as breakfast.

name: potato chips
reason: Sliced, fried in seed oil, and engineered for 'bet you can't eat just one'. That's not a challenge, it's a design spec.

name: powdered sugar
reason: Refined sugar ground even finer with added cornstarch — processing on top of processing.

name: pringles
reason: Not even technically chips — pressed potato flakes with seed oils.

name: protein bar
reason: Most are candy bars with added protein powder. Check the ingredients — seed oils and sweeteners galore.

name: protein shake
reason: Isolated protein powder + artificial sweeteners + seed oil emulsifiers. Eat real food.

name: ramen noodles
reason: Pre-fried in palm oil, the seasoning packet is mostly salt and MSG. Real ramen takes 12+ hours.

name: red bull
reason: Synthetic caffeine, sugar, and taurine in a tiny overpriced can.

name: reeses
reason: Sugar, soybean oil, and PGPR. Not real peanut butter or chocolate.

name: rice krispies
reason: Refined rice, sugar, salt, and BHT preservative.

name: ritz crackers
reason: Refined flour, soybean oil, and high fructose corn syrup. Crackers didn't used to need 15 ingredients.

name: ruffles
reason: Ridged for extra seed oil absorption.

name: salad dressing
reason: Seed oil, sugar, and emulsifiers in a bottle — just use olive oil and vinegar.

name: sausage roll
reason: Mystery meat in refined pastry — the British gas station staple.

name: skittles
reason: Pure sugar with artificial dyes. Taste the rainbow of chemicals.

name: slim jim
reason: Mechanically separated chicken, corn syrup, soy protein, and sodium nitrite shaped like a stick.

name: snickers
reason: Sugar, soybean oil, corn syrup, and artificial flavors.

name: soy milk
reason: Processed soybeans, added sugar, seed oil emulsifiers, and synthetic vitamins. A far cry from traditional tofu.

name: spaghetti bolognese
reason: Store-bought pasta is refined wheat stripped of nutrients. The jarred sauce is loaded with sugar, seed oils, and preservatives.

name: special k
reason: Rice, wheat gluten, sugar, and a pile of synthetic vitamins.

name: sports drink
reason: Water, sugar, artificial colors, and electrolytes you could get from a banana and a pinch of salt.

name: sprite
reason: Sugar water with a marketing budget.

name: starburst
reason: Palm fat, corn syrup, and artificial flavors shaped like candy.

name: subway
reason: Their 'fresh bread' contains over 40 ingredients. A real loaf needs 4.

name: sunny d
reason: Contains 2% juice and 98% water, corn syrup, and canola oil.

name: swedish fish
reason: Sugar, inverted sugar, and corn syrup. Three types of sugar.

name: taco bell
reason: A taco in name only — the 'beef' is 36% beef, the rest is fillers, flavoring, and seed oils.

name: teriyaki sauce
reason: Real teriyaki is soy, mirin, and sake. Bottled versions add corn syrup, seed oils, and caramel color.

name: toaster strudel
reason: Soybean oil, high fructose corn syrup, and artificial flavors.

name: tortilla chips
reason: Corn ground, fried in seed oil, and salted. Real nachos don't come from a bag.

name: tostitos
reason: Corn, seed oils, and salt. That's not a chip, that's a vehicle for trash.

name: triscuit
reason: Whole grain wheat and soybean oil. Almost food but the oil ruins it.

name: twinkies
reason: 37 ingredients including multiple seed oils. The cream filling contains no cream.

name: twizzlers
reason: Corn syrup, wheat flour, and artificial flavoring pretending to be licorice.

name: vegan cheese
reason: Starch, seed oils, coconut oil, and 'natural flavors' — trying very hard to be something it's not.

name: velveeta
reason: A "pasteurized prepared cheese product" — legally can't call itself cheese.

name: waffles
reason: The frozen kind: refined flour, sugar, seed oils, and enough preservatives to last months in your freezer.

name: wendys
reason: Fresh, never frozen beef — cooked in seed oil and served on a refined flour bun.

name: wheat thins
reason: Soybean oil, sugar, and malt syrup hiding behind the word "wheat".

name: whey protein isolate
reason: Industrially isolated dairy byproduct. Real food doesn't come in a tub with a scoop.

name: white bread
reason: Refined flour stripped of all nutrients, then 'enriched' by adding synthetic vitamins back. A factory product.

name: white sugar
reason: Sugarcane stripped of every mineral and vitamin until pure sucrose remains — empty calories by design.

name: wrap
reason: A refined flour tortilla with green food coloring doesn't make it healthy — it's just a flat piece of white bread.

name: chicken roll
reason: White bread roll, processed chicken fillet, mayo, and butter — a deli-counter insulin bomb.

name: breakfast roll
reason: Sausage, bacon, white pudding, and egg crammed into a white roll with butter. Every bite is a processed medley.

name: spice bag
reason: Deep-fried chicken, chips, peppers, and onions in spiced seed oil. The pride of every Irish chipper.

name: battered sausage
reason: A processed sausage dipped in flour batter and deep fried in seed oil. Double trash.

name: onion rings
reason: Onions battered in refined flour and deep fried in seed oil.

name: mozzarella sticks
reason: Cheese breaded in refined flour and deep fried in seed oil.

name: tater tots
reason: Processed potato reformed into shapes and deep fried in seed oil.

name: spring rolls
reason: Refined flour wrapper filled with vegetables, deep fried in seed oil.

name: samosa
reason: Refined flour pastry filled with potatoes, deep fried in seed oil.

name: churros
reason: Refined flour dough deep fried in seed oil and rolled in sugar.

name: chicken kiev
reason: Processed chicken breast stuffed with garlic butter, breaded, and fried in seed oil.

name: fish fingers
reason: Processed fish reformed into shapes, breaded in refined flour, fried in seed oil.

name: ready meal
reason: Industrial ingredients list longer than your arm. Seed oils, preservatives, emulsifiers.

name: frozen lasagne
reason: Refined pasta, processed cheese sauce, seed oils, preservatives, and mystery meat.

name: frozen burrito
reason: Refined flour tortilla with processed fillings, seed oils, and preservatives.

name: chicken pie
reason: Refined flour pastry with processed chicken filling, seed oils, and thickeners.

name: sausage
reason: Processed meat with fillers, preservatives, and often seed oils.

name: bacon
reason: Cured processed meat with nitrates, sugar, and preservatives.

name: deli meat
reason: Processed meat with nitrates, sugar, phosphates, and seed oils.

name: pepperoni
reason: Processed cured meat with nitrates, sugar, and artificial flavoring.

name: nuggets
reason: Mechanically processed chicken, breaded in refined flour, fried in seed oil.

name: fried rice
reason: White rice fried in seed oil with soy sauce, MSG, and processed additions.

name: garlic bread
reason: White bread with margarine or seed oil butter substitute and garlic flavoring.

name: coleslaw
reason: Cabbage drowned in seed oil mayonnaise and sugar.

name: curry sauce
reason: Seed oil, modified starch, sugar, artificial flavoring, and food coloring.

name: sweet and sour
reason: Seed oil, corn syrup, modified starch, artificial flavoring.

name: biscuits
reason: Refined flour, sugar, seed oils, and artificial flavoring.

name: crisps
reason: Thin potato slices deep fried in seed oil with artificial flavoring.

name: noodles
reason: Refined flour noodles fried in palm oil with MSG and artificial seasoning.

name: chicken burger
reason: Breaded processed chicken fried in seed oil, served in a refined flour bun.

name: kebab
reason: Processed reformed meat on a spit with seed oils, fillers, and preservatives.

name: lasagne
reason: Refined flour pasta sheets with processed cheese sauce, seed oils, and often processed meat.

name: pasta
reason: Refined wheat flour stripped of nutrients. The base of a thousand processed meals.

name: white rice
reason: Stripped of bran and germ — just starch. Spikes blood sugar like candy.

name: bread
reason: Refined flour, seed oils, sugar, and preservatives. Modern bread is barely food.

name: tortilla
reason: Refined flour, seed oil, and preservatives pressed into a disc.

name: crackers
reason: Refined flour, seed oil, and salt baked into a crisp. Empty calories.

name: cereal
reason: Extruded refined grains with sugar, seed oils, and synthetic vitamins.

name: chocolate
reason: Mostly sugar, milk powder, and soy lecithin. The cocoa is an afterthought.

name: sweets
reason: Pure sugar, corn syrup, artificial colors, and gelatin.
